scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-js" "npx netlify dev"
scripts.//start: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npx ecstatic public" "npm run watch-sass"
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run build-js && npm run build-sass
scripts.build-js: browserify --debug --global-transform [ aliasify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-htm ] ] -p esmify src/index.js > public/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify --debug --global-transform [ aliasify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-htm ] ] -p esmify src/index.js -o public/bundle.js
scripts.copy: mkdir -p public && mkdir -p public/img && cp src/img/* public/img && cp src/_redirects public && mkdir -p public/admin && cp src/admin/* public/admin && cp src/index.html src/mysqpaymentform.css src/*.otf src/*.png src/icons/* public && mkdir -p public/font && cp assets/YportTrial-Book.otf public/font
